actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to remove certain restrictions which prevent recent graduates from educational institutions from using income averaging.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the restrictions against income averaging by individuals recently supported by other individuals.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to remove certain restrictions which prevent recent graduates from educational institutions from using income averaging.
